Class Collision

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Collision

public abstract class Collision
extends greenfoot.Actor

This class contains two methods for pixel-perfect collision-detection

Method Detail

getOneTouchedObject

public greenfoot.Actor getOneTouchedObject(java.lang.Class clss)
This method is a pixel perfect collision detection. It returns a touched actor of the given class, if there's one touched.

getTouchedObjects

public java.util.List getTouchedObjects(java.lang.Class clss)
This method is a pixel perfect collision detection. Returns a List of all Actors, that are touched by this object

onPlatform

protected boolean onPlatform()
Checks if the object is one a platform

Returns:
boolean On or Off platform

touch

public boolean touch(greenfoot.Actor a_big)
This method is a pixel perfect collision detection. Returns true, if the object touchs the given Actor

touch

public boolean touch(java.lang.Class clss)
This method is a pixel perfect collision detection. Return, if it intersects an actor of the given class

touchSide

                            greenfoot.Actor a)
see if its touching the side of a tile

Parameters:
left - Left or Right
